short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Eggy Car Official is a skill game in which you drive a car containing a loosely held egg! Have fun!
short.bg: Eggy Car Official е игра за умения, в която шофираш кола, която съдържа слабо държано яйце! Приятно забавление!
short.ca: Eggy Car Official és un joc d'habilitat en què condueixes un cotxe que conté un ou que es manté lliurement! Que t'ho passis bé!
short.cs: Eggy Car Official je dovednostní hra, ve které řídíte auto s volně drženým vajíčkem! Bavi se!
short.da: Eggy Car Official er et færdighedsspil, hvor du kører i en bil med et løst holdt æg! God fornøjelse!
short.de,tr: ¡Eggy Car Official es un juego de habilidad en el que conduces un coche que contiene un huevo suelto! ¡Diviértete!
short.el: ¡Eggy Car Official es un juego de habilidad en el que conduces un automóvil que contiene un huevo suelto! ¡Diviértete!
short.es: ¡Eggy Car Official es un juego de habilidad en el que conduces un coche con un huevo suelto en su interior! ¡Diviértete!
short.et: Eggy Car Officiel est un jeu de compétences dans lequel vous conduisez une voiture contenant un œuf maintenu lâchement !…
short.fi: Eggy Car Official on taitopeli, jossa ajat autolla, jossa on löyhästi pidetty muna! Pidä hauskaa!
short.fil: Ang Eggy Car Official ay isang laro sa pagkaalam kung saan ikaw ay magmamaneho ng kotse na may lusaw na itlog! Mag-enjoy!
short.fr: Eggy Car Official est un jeu d'adresse dans lequel vous conduisez une voiture contenant un œuf mal fixé ! Amusez-vous bien !
short.he,it: Eggy Car Official es un juego de habilidad en el que conduces un coche que contiene un huevo suelto. ¡Diviértete!
short.hi: Eggy Car Official est un jeu d'adresse dans lequel vous conduisez une voiture contenant un œuf à peine tenu ! Amusez-vous bien !
short.hr: Eggy Car službeno je vještina igra u kojoj vozite automobil koji sadrži labavo držano jaje! Uživajte!
short.hu: Az Eggy Car Official egy ügyességi játék, amelyben egy lazán tartott tojást tartalmazó autót vezetsz! Jó szórakozást!
short.id: Eggy Car Official adalah permainan keterampilan di mana Anda mengendarai mobil yang berisi telur yang longgar! Selamat…
short.ja: Eggy Car Official は、ゆるく持たれた卵を乗せた車を運転するスキルゲームです！楽しんでください！
short.ko: 완충력이 약한 달걀이 들어있는 차를 운전하는 스킬 게임인 Eggy Car Official입니다! 즐겁게 즐기세요!
short.lt: Eggy Car Official yra įgūdžių žaidimas, kuriame vairuojate automobilį, kuriame yra laisvai tvinkčiojantis kiaušinis! Geros žaidimo!
short.lv: "Eggy Car Official" ir prasmes spēle, kurā jūs braucat ar automobili, kurā ir brīvi turēta ola! Izbaudi!
short.ms: Eggy Car Official adalah permainan skill di mana anda mengendalikan kereta yang mengandungi telur yang tidak berapa tahan! Selamat…
short.nl: Eggy Car Official is een behendigheidsspel waarin je een auto bestuurt met daarin een losjes vastgehouden ei! Veel plezier!
short.no: ¡Eggy Car Official es un juego de habilidad en el que conduces un coche con un huevo suelto en él! ¡Diviértete!
short.pl: Eggy Car Oficjalna to gra zręcznościowa, w której prowadzisz samochód z luźno trzymanym jajkiem! Baw się dobrze!
short.ro: Eggy Car Official este un joc de îndemânare în care conduci o mașină care conține un ou ținut în mod lax! Distrează-te!
short.ru: Eggy Car Official - игра, в которой вы управляете автомобилем, внутри которого находится слабо закрепленное яйцо! Веселитесь!
short.sk: Eggy Car Official je zručnostná hra, v ktorej riadite auto s voľne držaným vajíčkom! Užite si ju!
short.sl: Zvanični Eggy Car je igra veštine u kojoj vozite automobil sa opuštenim jajetom! Uživajte!
short.sr: Eggy Car Official je veštičarska igrica u kojoj vozite automobil u kojem je labavo smešteno jaje! Uživajte!
short.sv: Eggy Car Official är ett skicklighetsspel där du kör en bil som innehåller ett löst ägg! Ha kul!
short.th: Eggy Car Official เป็นเกมที่ต้องใช้ทักษะในการขับรถที่มีไข่ที่ถูกจับค่อนข้างไม่แน่นแน่นอยู่ในรถ! สนุกนะคะ!
short.uk: Eggy Car Official - це гра навичок, в якій ви керуєте автомобілем із невпевнено тримаючимся яйцем! Грайте й насолоджуйтесь!
short.vi: Eggy Car Official là một trò chơi kỹ năng trong đó bạn lái một chiếc xe chứa một quả trứng được giữ một cách lỏng lẻo! Chúc vui vẻ!
short.zh_CN: Eggy Car Official是一款技巧游戏，你要驾驶一辆装着松散的鸡蛋的汽车！玩得开心！
short.zh_TW: Eggy Car Official 是一款技巧遊戲，你要駕駛一輛裡面裝有一顆松散的蛋的車！玩得開心！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚗🥚 Embark on a Egg-Rolling Odyssey with Eggy Car Official! 🕹️🌟

Prepare for an eggstraordinary journey as Eggy Car races onto the Chrome Web Store! 🚗🥚 Assume command of your delightful eggy sidekick and maneuver through a realm brimming with surprises and challenges. Propel yourself to triumph, conquer obstacles, and amass rewards in this thrilling egg-ceptional adventure. Are you ready to unfold the fun? Don't wait! Click "Add to Chrome" now and dive into the eggstraordinary escapades of Eggy Car! 🕹️🚗🌟

🌈 Unique Features:

🥚 Charming Eggy Companion: Form an alliance with a lovable egg on wheels, traversing diverse environments, each more enchanting than the last.
🌟 Dynamic Obstacle Course: Navigate through a vibrant obstacle course teeming with ramps, challenges, and unexpected delights that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
🚗 Lucrative Collectibles: Collect eggs and other exciting treasures along your journey, unlocking new levels and infusing an element of surprise into your adventure.
🕹️ Accessible and Addictive Gameplay: Revel in the simplicity of easy-to-master controls and the addictive gameplay that makes Eggy Car enjoyable for players of all ages.
🎵 Lively Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the rhythmic beats of an upbeat soundtrack, adding an extra layer of joy to your egg-rolling escapades.

👉 How to Embark on Your Egg-venture:

Click "Add to Chrome" to initiate Eggy Car Official.
Assume control of your eggy companion, expertly navigating the vibrant obstacle course.
Collect eggs, conquer challenges, and unfold the fun in this eggstraordinary adventure!
Are you ready to roll into an egg-ceptional escapade? Click now and immerse yourself in the crack-tastic world of Eggy Car! 🚗🥚
🕹️Play more games on the top left menu
🥚On clicking full screen icon it is redirecting to official site
